about.title: About
about.p1: After five years in the French Air Force, I chose to settle in Dubai to focus on real estate. I now work at Sherwoods Property, specializing in the Dubai Creek Harbour district.
about.p2: Whether you're looking to invest or simply settle here, I support you in a simple, human and transparent way. My role is to help you find a property that truly meets your expectations, without pressure, and with real follow-up from start to finish.
about.p3: I value trust, listening and relationships: because real estate is not just a product â€” it's a life project.
